name: V6Pictures
termsAndConditions: 20% of the amount payable on order confirmation
Full payment should be paid on completion of function and all raw photos will be sent only on receipt of final payment
This quotation is only for Wedding, if any other functions like (Nalangu, Family Samberthayam, etc.,) additional charges will be collected
One revision of album design is for free. Customers can request for additional changes at an extra cost
Accommodation not included in this package it must be care of client
Transportation and accommodation for outdoor photo-shoot should be taken care by client for shoots
For customized package, please feel to call us at anytime
We will use some of the images in our website or facebook page for promoting our work
